data.message: I will just continue to write here until a person from Facebook decides to answer my business questions. STOP CHARGING MY CREDIT CARD FOR SERVICES NOT RENDERED!

replies.message:
Hi Todd. So we can better assist you, would you please reach out to us in a private message?
 Thanks. -Elizabeth
You ask for me to do everything but  do not tell me how to do it. Great customer service.
How much is this message going to cost me?

Are you an actual FB employee?  So Elizabeth how do I priveately communicate with you or is this another attempt to block me from getting this straightened out? How do you charge a customer for an Instagram account that is not even active? I need to stop the ad campaigns and you have absolutely no place to stop from you charging my credit cards for no services rendered. I deleted the ad campaigns but I bet that will not stop you from charging my credit card. You know ehat is horrid? I got 380 likes on the Bree Pillow ad but no sales. I tried the ad which was to be a link to my sales page and guess what? The link on your ad did not work. It did not work on either ad. But I have to pay you nonthe less for an ad campaign that does not work. How much are you going to charge me for the deleted ads in November because I do not know the mystical place on FB where to stop you from stealing from me. I called your customer support number 850-543-4800 and all that is, is a recording stating there is no customer support but to look at the bottom of any page where there is a link to complete customer support. I yet have to discover this link to mystical customer support forms. Do not take any more money from my credit cards. I am an author and I can just as easily write a book about you nonexistent customer service scam as the Healthcare scam in America. The choice is yours. I can whip up a hundred pages in days and have it in the copyright office in a day after that. By this message can you tell I'm an author? Get it together. For the money I spent I did not sell one book because the links on FB did not work. Hundreds of likes and absolutely no sales? I guess FB is a horrible marketplace. Please stop taking my money illegally from my credit cards. I set the dollar amount and the time limit but apparently there was some mystical part of some unknown page I did not complete so you believe my credit card is yours. It's not. You are like a billboard company putting up an ad for a company that did not hire you then billing them. That is a crime. STOP IT.
